theme.description: Theme object for customisation of the app.

fullscreen.description: Sets whether the application should open in full screen by default.

kiosk.description: Hides the settings button from drawer.

itemPicturesEnabled.description: Enables showing of item images in receipt and search.

priceVerificationEnabled.description: Displays price verification button in PLU and item search, only for countries that do not require a control transaction for that.

keyboardShortcuts.description: Settings for POS keybindings and fast commands.

hotKeys.description: Enabled hot keys for the app.

KeyBindingType.description: This is a definition of the POS keybindings.

keyCode.description: Key or code property value of the KeyboardEvent that will be used to trigger the action.

altKey.description: Defines whether the Alt key should be pressed

ctrlKey.description: Defines whether the Control key should be pressed

shiftKey.description: Defines whether the Shift key should be pressed

metaKey.description: Defines whether the Meta/Command key should be pressed

KeyboardShortcutsType.description: This is a definition of the POS keybindings and fast commands.

primaryAction.description: Used to set the primary action keybinding. It will trigger the submission of the prompts shown in the POS or other action that considered as primary on the current application screen (i.e. sumbit login form)

secondaryAction.description: Used to set the secondary action keybinding. It will trigger the cancel of the prompts shown in the POS or other action that considered as secondary on the current application screen (i.e. open pin setup on login screen)

lock.description: Used to set the lock keybinding. It will trigger the opening of the lock confirmation dialog.

secondaryPaymentMethod.description: Used to set the secondary payment method keybinding.

primaryPaymentMethod.description: Used to set the primary payment method keybinding. In the POS application primary payment method is assigned to the highlited button in the payment menu.

openPLU.description: Used to set the open PLU keybinding.

openTransactionsSearch.description: Used to set the open transactions search keybinding.

openWebBrowser.description: Used to set the open embedded web browser keybinding. Note: it requires the corresponding feature flag to be enabled.

openVariantSearch.description: Used to set the open variant search keybinding. Note: it requires the corresponding feature flag to be enabled.

openRescans.description: Used to set the open rescan keybinding. Note: it requires the corresponding feature flag to be enabled.

openItemSearch.description: Used to set the open item search keybinding.

addItem.description: Used to set the add item keybinding. It will trigger the addition of the item with selected barcode to the receipt

^[0-9]+$.description: Key binding for the barcode number.

fastCommands.description: Enables fast commands for the POS.

registerWithQuantity.description: Settings for register with quantity fast command.

enabled.description: Enables register with quantity for the POS.

ServerType.description: This is a definition of the server settings.

networkCallTimeout.description: The timeout for network calls. In milliseconds.

EdgeType.description: This is a definition of the edge settings.

host.description: Edge host URL. Allows the application to switch to the Edge solution offline.

AutoUpdateType.description: This is a definition of the app update maintenance window.

channel.description: The channel for the update. Customers must use only the preview and stable channels - internal is reserved. All new updates will appear in the preview channel before being promoted to the stable channel. A preview channel will get preview and stable updates. A stable channel will get only stable updates. Customers are encouraged to setup a few tills on the preview channels to test drive new updates before being promoted to stable.

maintenanceExclusion.description: The maintenance exclusion window for the update. The exclusion maintenance period takes precedence over any scheduled maintenance window. Maximum of 30 days allowed. The exlusion window is applied only for stable channel and only for major and minor updates(semantic versioning).

start.description: The start date and time of the maintenance exclusion. Specify in the UTC time zone.

duration.description: The number of days from the start date for the maintenance exclusion to take precedence.

maintenanceWindow.description: The maintenance window for the update. During this window the update will download and install automatically. To start update the app must be open else it will try to update on the next maintenance window. The maintenance window is applied to preview and stable channels for major, minor and patch updates(see semantic versioning)

days.description: Days of the week when the maintenance can occur.

start.description: The start time of the maintenance window. Specify in the UTC time zone.

end.description: The end time of the maintenance window. Specify in the UTC time zone.

MposPeripheralType.description: This is a definition of the Mobile POS peripherals settings.

cameraScanner.description: Defines whether camera scanning is enabled

enabled.description: Enable camera scanning buttons in main view and prompts

whitelistedPrompts.description: By default camera scan button will be visible in main view and all prompts. One can whitelist specific prompt codes where camera should be enabled only.

MposConnectType.description: This is a definition of the Mobile Soft payment terminal providers settings.

PeripheralsType.description: This is a definition of the peripherals properties settings.

legacy.description: Enables legacy MQTT peripherals instead of gRPC.

CashChangerType.description: This is a definition of the CashChanger settings.

ScaleType.description: This is a definition of the scale settings.

ScannerType.description: This is a definition of the scanner settings.

PrinterType.description: This is a definition of the printer settings.

LockType.description: This is a definition of the lock settings.

timeout.description: The number of seconds the register is idle before it is autolocked.

ReceiptType.description: This is a definition of the receipt settings.

clearTimeout.description: The duration for which the receipt remains visible after finalization. In milliseconds.

linkedPromptionsIndicatorEnabled.description: Enables visual linking of related promotion items with color bars in the active receipt view.

ReceiptLayoutType.description: This is a definition of the receipt layout settings.

identifierType.description: The type of the identifier to be displayed in the receipt.

shareRetailInformation.description: Set true to share retail info like: countryCode, businessunitId, workstationId, operatorId, tenantId.

VariantSearchType.description: This is a definition of the variant search settings.

whitelistedFilters.description: Whitelisted filters for the variant search. Filter name should match ID of the corresponding additional property of the item. By default whitelisted filters are only Size and Color.

integerMonetary.description: Indicates if the monetary input should accept decimals or not.

KeyboardOverridesType.description: Defines specific prompt codes that override the default keyboard type.

TxType.description: The configuration point to determine whether a customer's specific order numbers are handled by an external or internal repository.

internal.description: Defines how internal transaction numbers (RegularOrder) should be detected.

pattern.description: Regular expression for internal transaction numbers.

external.description: Defines how external customer order numbers (ExternalCustomerOrder) should be detected.

enabled.description: When enabled, transaction numbers matching the external pattern will be treated as external.

pattern.description: Regular expression for external transaction numbers. Write it as a JSON string, backslashes must be escaped (e.g. '\d{6}''), without leading/trailing slashes (/../).
